themes.description: This theme covers feedback, suggestions, or issues related to specific trading functionalities, tools, and options within the platform. It includes requests for new features or improvements to existing ones.
This theme covers general complaints about the platform's reliability, trustworthiness, or accusations of fraudulent behavior without specific technical or transactional details.
This theme covers requests for new features, improvements to existing features, or general feedback on the functionality of the application.
Concerns related to the non-receipt, delay, or incorrect calculation of dividend payouts.
Requests or complaints about features that are currently unavailable in the application or platform.
Overall positive or negative feedback about the platform's general usability, features, or user satisfaction.
Suggestions for new features, tools, or enhancements to existing functionalities within the platform.
Requests for new features, enhancements, or modifications to existing functionalities within the application.
General positive comments, compliments, or expressions of satisfaction with the application's overall performance or features.
Requests for new features, enhancements to existing functionalities, or suggestions for product improvements.
Overall positive comments about the app, its ease of use, or general satisfaction without specific feature mentions.
Reviews pertaining to the company as an employer, including work-life balance, policies, and company culture, rather than the product.
This theme covers complaints related to the application's user interface, navigation, design, and overall ease of use, including order placement flow.
Issues related to the accuracy, correctness, or availability of information displayed within the application.
Complaints about data privacy, unauthorized access, potential security vulnerabilities, or features that compromise user security.
Concerns regarding fraudulent activities, unethical practices, or a general loss of trust in the service provider.
This theme covers issues related to account setup, profile management, nominee addition, and other administrative account functions.
Problems related to the generation, format, accuracy, or availability of statements, reports, or other official documents.
This theme covers feedback on the platform's ability to provide useful recommendations, tools, or insights for stock picking and investment decisions.
This theme covers issues related to incorrect or unexpected changes in account balances, unauthorized deductions, or concerns about financial integrity and fraud.
This theme covers requests or feedback related to investment functionalities, tools, and features, such as mutual funds, goal-based investing, or portfolio management.
